The Shanxi Puxian Haojinyuan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Shangdian, Qiaojiawan Township, Puxian County, Linfen City

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Sales Group Puxian Haojinyuan Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The facility is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Sales Group Puxian Haojinyuan Coal Industry Co Ltd.
